title: Metabolic effects of a submaximal dose of pink salt and monosodium glutamate in experimental rats
content:
Publication date: 30 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 8

Author(s): Thamer Abdullah Alharbi, Syed Imam Rabbani, Raha Orfali, Moneer E. Almadani, Fuzail Ahmad, Rafiulla Gilkaramenthi, Ebtesam Abdulrahman Jibreel, Mohammed Sharique Ahmed Quadri, Syed Mohammed Basheeruddin Asdaq
